CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES( Contract__r.Contingency_Type__c , "ROR") , "ROR", ", ") & IF( INCLUDES( Contract__r.Contingency_Type__c , "POC") , "POC", ", ") & IF( INCLUDES( Contract__r.Contingency_Type__c , "Software Feature Delivery") , "Software Feature Delivery", ", ") & IF( INCLUDES( Contract__r.Contingency_Type__c , "Services Delivery") , "Services Delivery", ", ") & IF( INCLUDES( Contract__r.Contingency_Type__c , "Terms & Conditions") , "Terms & Conditions", ", ") & IF( INCLUDES( Contract__r.Contingency_Type__c , "Payment Terms") , "Payment Terms", ", ") & IF( INCLUDES( Contract__r.Contingency_Type__c , "Payment Delayed") , "Payment Delayed", ", ")
CustomField.label: Contingency Type
